# nb-badge



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description               | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `bgColor`  | `bg-color`  | 徽标底色                      | `string`  | `'#FB5B4C'` |
| `count`    | `count`     | 展示数字，0为隐藏                 | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `dot`      | `dot`       | 不展示数字，显示点                 | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `maxCount` | `max-count` | count的封顶数值超出则显示 maxCount+ | `number`  | `99`        |
| `offset`   | `offset`    | 位置偏移量                     | `number`  | `0`         |
| `showZero` | `show-zero` | 当count为0的时候也显示            | `boolean` | `false`     |
